features.title: Game Features
features.subtitle: Discover a world of endless possibilities with our innovative gameplay features

items.title: Open World Adventure
items.description: Explore a vast, seamless world filled with hidden treasures, dangerous foes, and breathtaking vistas.

items.title: Epic Combat System
items.description: Master a deep combat system with unique weapons and abilities. Chain attacks, dodge, and counter to become unstoppable.

items.title: Character Customization
items.description: Create your unique hero with extensive customization options. Choose your class, appearance, and abilities.

items.title: Dynamic Weather & Day/Night Cycle
items.description: Experience a living world with realistic weather effects and day/night cycles that affect gameplay and quests.

items.title: Multiplayer Co-op
items.description: Join forces with friends to tackle challenging content, trade items, and build a thriving community.

items.title: Cinematic Story
items.description: Immerse yourself in a narrative-driven adventure with memorable characters and branching storylines.

characters.title: Legendary Characters
characters.subtitle: Choose your champion and master their unique abilities

characters.name: Aria Nightshade
characters.description: A master of stealth and precision, Aria strikes from the shadows with deadly accuracy. Her twin blades are said to be forged from the essence of darkness itself.

characters.name: Ragnar Stormfury
characters.description: Born amidst a legendary storm, Ragnar wields the raw power of thunder and lightning. His mighty warhammer can call down bolts from the heavens to smite his enemies.

characters.name: Elara Moonsong
characters.description: Blessed by the moon goddess, Elara possesses powerful healing abilities and protective magic. Her melodic enchantments can mend wounds and reinvigorate allies in battle.
